channel.title: RuneCreation - 317 | OSRS Data | Full Zulrah | Bank Tabs | Ironman | HighScores
channel.description:
[center][url=http://runecreation.com/Client.jar][img]http://runecreation.com/icon.png[/img][b][u]Click Here To Play![/u][/b]>>>[img]http://runecreation.com/Banner.gif[/img][b][u]<<<Click Here To Play![/u][/b][img]http://runecreation.com/icon.png[/img][/url][/center] [center][size=large][size=x-large][b]We have a lot to offer you and every Wednesday and Saturday NEW Updates and improvements are implemented. Listening to the community and giving power to the players![/b][/size][/size]
[center][img]http://runecreation.com/icon.png[/img][/center]
[size=large][u][b]The Features we implemented because of our players are:[/b][/u][/size] - A unique home unlike other servers - Working Kraken Boss with realistic drop rates! - High Scores and Achievement Diary! - All Wilderness Bosses with the corresponding drops! - Flawless Combat! - Iron Man Mode! - Flawless Duel Arena! - Boss Pets! - Much, Much More!
[center][img]http://runecreation.com/icon.png[/img][/center]
[b][u]Bosses We Have Included[/u][/b] - Kraken Boss and The Smaller versions - Zulrah and the correct mechanics - Fully working God Wars Dungeon - All Wilderness Bosses and Demi Bosses - Choas Elemental - King Black Dragon - Giant Mole - Dagganoth Kings - Vet'ion - Venenatis - Callisto - Chaos Fanatic - Scorpia - Barrelchest (Releasing Sunday 21st) - Your Idea of a Custom Boss? - Many More!
[center][img]http://runecreation.com/icon.png[/img][/center]
[u][b][size=large]Features Of The Server![/size][/b] [/u][size=large][b]- Working Bounty hunter With a rewards shop working your way up from a Tier 1 Emblem to a Tier 10! [/b][/size] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/0fa93cd851df4a04366d672ab866759b.png[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/38b597ddf0d39eb3e83b71057b8312ff.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/5b519a27e3d5e2e9a1384e25db30c861.png[/img] [size=large][b]- Boss Pets[/b][/size] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/abc24eb84e14da5e37fbc77c2f76a0d4.png[/img] [size=large][b]- 3rd Age Rare Weapons (Sword, Bow, Wand) And Other Rare/Unique Items - Fully Functional Dragon Claws![/b][/size] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/70329b10c63df2690bef0f7377d2c385.png[/img] - Fully Functional Bank Tabs and Searching!
[center][img]http://runecreation.com/icon.png[/img][/center]
[size=large][b]There is so much more we can offer but simply not enough time for you to read it all so why dont you come on and see for yourself! just click [url=http://runecreation.com/Client.jar]HERE[/url] or the banner at the top of the page to come and play![/b][/size]
[size=large]Runecreation, Make Your Creations A Reality![/size] [/center]

[center]Click Here To Play!>>><<<Click Here To Play![/center]
[center][size=large][size=x-large]We have a lot to offer you and every Wednesday and Saturday NEW Updates and improvements are implemented. Listening to the community and giving power to the players![/size][/size]

[center][/center]

[size=large]The Features we implemented because of our players are:[/size]

  • High Scores and Achievement Diary!
  • All Wilderness Bosses with the corresponding drops!
  • Flawless Combat!
  • Iron Man Mode!
  • Flawless Duel Arena!
  • Boss Pets!
  • Much, Much More!

[center][/center]

  • Zulrah and the correct mechanics
  • Fully working God Wars Dungeon
  • All Wilderness Bosses and Demi Bosses

  • Dagganoth Kings
